_comment: REVIEWS DATABASE - Edit this file to manage reviews

_instructions.how_to_add_position: Change 'position': null to 'position': 'Coach at Blau Weiss Berlin'
_instructions.how_to_feature: Change 'featured': false to 'featured': true (review will appear in carousel)
_instructions.how_to_delete: Delete the entire review object from the array
_instructions.featured_reviews: Only reviews with 'featured': true appear in the carousel at top of page
_instructions.all_reviews: All reviews appear in the grid below carousel, newest first

reviews.name: Anonymous
reviews.text: Great photographer, been an absolute blast working with him. Really great at communication and keeps the shoot fun and friendly.

reviews.name: Divyansh Chawla
reviews.text: Arpith is a great photographer with an outstanding editing skills. He can capture rare moments like no one I know of. He also clicked some of my portraits which i liked so much that i posted on instagram. I really recommend him as other than his skills, he has a great personality.

reviews.name: Abhishek
reviews.text: Had a him shoot my car before he moved to Germany. Loved the results. Absolutely recommend.

reviews.name: Chan-Ho Kahng
reviews.text:
Arpith was introduced to us through one of our players and we are really happy with all the amazing photos Arpith took of us! He does a great job capturing the on-field action and impresses us with great shots. He also helps us with teampictures and individual portraits, even offering different styles if needed. 
Working with Arpith is really easy and we couldnÂ´t be happier with the photos provided! We are looking forward to future collaborations!

reviews.name: Farooque Ahmed
reviews.text: An incredibly talented photographer with a great eye for detail. The entire process was smooth and professional, the final images exceeded expectations and was delivered quickly. highly recommend.

reviews.name: Marcus Cummings
reviews.text: Arpith has been an outstanding photographer for both me and the GISMA University football team. His work is consistently highquality and his dedication to capturing the best moments truly stands out. He is professional, reliably and fully committed to delivering excellent results. We've really enjoyed working with him and look forward to many more projects together in the future.
